name: Prisonela
description:
Prisonela - is an endless hardcore platformer in which the levels are chosen randomly!

A prison sentence could never be so insane before... You will have a wild competition, where the reward will be your life! You have nothing to lose, because there is nothing but competition in the harsh conditions of prison madness... HA-HA-HA!

Peculiar properties:
- Beautiful pixel art graphics!
- Endless game to the death!
- Challenging levels that will make you nervous!
- Various traps!
- High score table, you can share the results with your friends!
- Achievements!
